description: silver coffee pot with hinged lid and handle; ivory section at handle center; ivory disk beneath finial at top of lid; scalloped design around body and lid; foliate decor on top and bottom of spout; wave design on both ends of handle; golden-color inside; thin round foot at bottom
dimension: 13 x 12 1/2 x 9 in. (33.02 x 31.75 x 22.86 cm) (including spout and handle)
title: Coffee pot
